onyomiExamples.meaning: super-, ultra-, hyper-, extreme, extremely, really, totally, absolutely, over, more than
excess of exports, favorable balance of trade, favourable balance of trade

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to cross over, to cross, to pass through, to pass over (out of), to go beyond, to go past, to exceed, to surpass, to be more (than)
to cross over (e.g. mountain), to go across, to get over (e.g. hardship), to pass time (e.g. a winter), to surpass, to be better than, to exceed, to move house, to go, to come
